title: Nemesis Jax chromas not available for ip
body: The Nemesis Jax chromas are not showing up with all the others. Seems to be the only one that isn't showing up.

replies.body: Good catch!  It looks like there's an issue right now with Nemesis Jax Chromas, so individual purchases have been disabled until that gets fixed up.  Updates will be posted on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Hang tight!

Thanks dude i was so close on buying it with RP... i mean you guys have a great game and i wand to help yall out with  money but i guess its better to buy them with ip as long as its possible :D
<3
When will I be able to get nemesis jax chromas for ip? I'm getting worried as the sale is ending in two days and it's still disabled.
